            Construct a helper for backing up and restoring the android.content.SharedPreferences under the given names.

values.code: performBackup(oldState: ParcelFileDescriptor!, data: BackupDataOutput!, newState: ParcelFileDescriptor!)
values.desc: Backs up the configured android.content.SharedPreferences groups.
Restores one entity from the restore data stream to its proper shared preferences file store.
